prospect.name: Harvey Norman
prospect.notes: Large Australian electronics and furniture retailer. JS-heavy e-commerce site — requires Playwright adapter.

pageSections.description: Sections observed on homepage (for manual content creation reference)

sections.name: Header
sections.notes: Search bar, account icons, cart. Hamburger menu left.

sections.name: Navigation
sections.notes: Hamburger menu with categories. Right-aligned order status, catalogue, stores.

sections.name: Hero Carousel
sections.notes: Rotating banners — Latitude credit card promo, Winter Olympics 2026.

sections.name: Category Tiles
sections.notes: 4 tiles: Google Pixel, Bonus Gift Cards, Future of TV, Furniture.

sections.name: Featured Products
sections.notes: Today's featured products — 4 product cards with prices and ratings.

sections.name: Product Rows
sections.notes: ~6 rows of 4 products each: computers, cameras, audio, gaming, appliances, furniture.

sections.name: Services
sections.notes: 4 service cards: Click & Collect, delivery, finance, trade-in.

sections.name: Brand Partners
sections.notes: Logo strip: Optus, Microsoft, Sonos, Google, Apple, Samsung, LG, Dyson, Breville, Electrolux.

nextSteps: Add 3-4 product page URLs to harvest config for deeper product content
Create product entries manually from harvested product images
Build navigation structure from observed menu items
Set up AI Actions for SEO/GEO generation
Configure preview app with HN branding
